C

calcDistance(double, double, double, double) - Static method in class Simulator
Computes the Euclidean distance between two 2D points
calculateInterference(RSU) - Static method in class Simulator
Calculates the interference an RSU receives from every vehicle it isn't attmepting to receive from, in a num_hops neighborhood.
calculateSINR(RSU) - Static method in class Simulator
Computes the SINR faced by an RSU
changeVelocity() - Static method in class Simulator
Changes the velocity of vehicles in vehlist by making use of each vehicle's timer, and samples a new velocity from an exponential distribution once the countdown reaches zero.
checkNbhdIdle(ArrayList<ArrayList<RSU>>, Vehicle) - Static method in class Simulator
Checks of the num_hops hop neighbourhood of a vehicle v is tx-free, by checking if there is any tx at the neighbouring RSUs.
cw_max - Static variable in class Simulator
Contention window upper bound.
cw_min - Static variable in class Simulator
Contention window lower bound.
